title: Looking for duo Silver-Gold
body: I play Jungle Top and Mid. I have discord for comms.

replies.body: Try our gaming community www.taw.net, We have discord and team speak. Our player average is silver though we have diamonds and such as well (playing the climb is terrible but a good smurf friend is nice). Though we are here to improve, we have two events a 5 vs 5 coms and become better as a team to improve as a player and a full 5 team. If you really want to become better, try us.
